"use strict";
 
// http://mostafa-samir.github.io/async-iterative-patterns-pt1/
module.exports = function WaterfallOver(list, iterator, callback) {
  var nextItemIndex = 0; // keep track of the index of the next item to be processed
 
  function report() {
    nextItemIndex++;
 
    // if nextItemIndex equals the number of items in list, then we're done
    if (nextItemIndex === list.length) callback();else
      // otherwise, call the iterator on the next item
      iterator(list[nextItemIndex], report);
  }
 
  // instead of starting all the iterations, we only start the 1st one
  iterator(list[0], report);
};
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Wed Dec 27 2017 15:41:50 GMT+0100 (CET)
